required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of ASC42 in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Dose Escalation, Single Center Phase I Study to Evaluate Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics (Biomarkers) of ASC42 in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock:
This is a first in human study of single and multiple ascending doses and food effect of ASC42.
This study consists of 8 cohorts and is divided as follows:
Part Ia: Single ascending doses study including cohorts 1 to 5. Part Ib: A cross-over design of cohort 2 to study the food effect on ASC42 PK. Part II: Multiple ascending doses study including cohorts 6 to 8.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events [Safety and Tolerability]
primary_outcome.description: Occurrence of Serious Adverse Event (SAE), Adverse Event (AE) resulting in treatment discontinuation and/or dose reductions, and AE of special interest, from baseline up to 21 days

secondary_outcome.time_frame: On Day 1 to Day 14 after single or multiple doses, respectively. The entire study will last up to 15 days.
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate the Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve after single and multiple oral doses of ASC42 administered to healthy volunteers.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: On Day 1 to Day 14 after single or multiple doses, respectively. The entire study will last up to 15 days.
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate the Peak Plasma Concentration after single and multiple oral doses of ASC42 administered to healthy volunteers.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: On Day 1 to Day 14 after single or multiple doses, respectively. The entire study will last up to 15 days.
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate the Terminal-Phase Half-Life after single and multiple oral doses of ASC42 administered to healthy volunteers.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: On Day 1 to Day 14 after single or multiple doses, respectively. The entire study will last up to 15 days.
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate the Apparent Systemic Clearance after single and multiple oral dose of ASC42 administered to healthy volunteers.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: On Day 1 to Day 14 after single or multiple doses, respectively. The entire study will last up to 15 days.
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate the Apparent Volume of Distribution after single and multiple oral dose of ASC42 administered to healthy volunteers.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: On Day 1 to Day 14 after single or multiple doses, respectively. The entire study will last up to 15 days.
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate the Time to reach the maximum plasma concentration after single single and multiple oral doses of ASC42 administered to healthy volunteers.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: On Day 1 to Day 14 after single or multiple doses, respectively. The entire study will last up to 15 days.
On Day 1 to Day 14 after single or multiple doses, respectively. The entire study will last up to 15 days.

arm_group.description: ASC42 tablet，Dose 1，Dose 2，Dose 3，Dose 4，and Dose 5, single dose administration
Placebo tablet，Dose 1，Dose 2，Dose 3，Dose 4，and Dose 5, single dose administration

criteria.textblock:
Key Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy male and female subjects between 18 to 65 years of age.
- Subjects' weight ≥ 50 kg and BMI within the range of 19 - 29 kg/m2.
- Physical examination and vital signs are within normal range or slightly abnormal.
Key Exclusion Criteria:
- History or current liver disease, or liver injuries.
- A positive HBsAg, HCV Ab and/or HIV Ab.
- Platelet count <150,000/mcL
- INR> 1.2
